p.d: Moussa Konaté is pressing charges for fraud and abuse of trust: his friend had offered to invoke the genii, holders of the secret to eternal wealth, in exchange for the tidy sum of 400,000 Zamboland francs! Directed by: Anselm Nfa (Ivory Coast, season 2, 2019) Cast: Sonia Aka (judge Savhera), Fredy Alain Gires Ayemou (officer Wanderma), Dehe Ange Kader (officer Sandro) Genre: comedy drama
